title: Slightly rounded Sans, similar to Priva Three (DSType)
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110421im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Exembol_example_5721.jpg)

I'm trying to identify this font. There's a slightly rounded edge similar to that of 'Hermes'.

The closest I can get is:  
Priva Three from Priva Pro by DSType

Any ideas from you pro's out there?

Font: 

 FS Albert 

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110421/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")
author: pango

comments.content:

Many thanks @akira1975 — you're a star!
